weather.precipitation: Moderate chance of rain showers, but often still feels like late summer with pleasant sunny spells. Start of autumn colors may appear. Daylight around 13-14 hours.
weather.general_tips: Pack for variety: T-shirts, long sleeves, fleece/sweater, waterproof/windproof jacket. Good walking shoes essential, waterproof hiking boots if doing major hikes.

tourism_level.crowds: Moderate shoulder season. Fewer crowds than peak summer, but still relatively busy at popular spots like Pulpit Rock.
tourism_level.pricing: Shoulder season pricing may begin, offering slightly better value than July/August.
tourism_level.overall_atmosphere: Late summer transitioning to autumn. Good period for popular hikes and enjoying the city before the wetter season fully arrives.

events_holidays.name: Late Summer Hiking Season
events_holidays.description: Often the last chance for reliable conditions on popular hikes like Preikestolen and Kjeragbolten.
events_holidays.notes: Always check weather forecasts (yr.no) and trail conditions (ut.no, Pulpit Rock website) before setting out.

unique_experiences.description: Trek to the iconic cliff plateau overlooking Lysefjord, enjoying fewer crowds than mid-summer.
unique_experiences.practical_tips: Start early. Wear proper hiking boots. Bring layers, waterproofs, food/water. Check transport schedules (ferry/bus).
unique_experiences.best_time: Daytime, preferably on a clear day

unique_experiences.description: Challenging hike to the boulder wedged between cliffs. September is often the last feasible month.
unique_experiences.practical_tips: Very demanding hike. Check conditions METICULOUSLY. Experienced hikers only recommended. Access via Lysevegen road (check if open) or ferry/bus.

unique_experiences.description: Enjoy a scenic boat trip through the fjord, seeing waterfalls and Pulpit Rock from below.
unique_experiences.practical_tips: Multiple departures likely still available. Book ahead. Dress warmly for deck viewing.

unique_experiences.description: Wander the city center, charming Old Stavanger, and the colourful street Øvre Holmegate.
unique_experiences.practical_tips: Comfortable walking shoes. Explore museums (Petroleum, Art, Canning) on wetter days.

weather.precipitation: Increased frequency of rain and wind, often becoming the wettest part of the year. Autumn colors more pronounced. Daylight shortens (approx 12.5 down to 11.5 hours).
weather.general_tips: Waterproof outerwear (jacket, trousers, shoes) becomes essential. Warm layers needed (fleece, wool). Hat and gloves useful.

tourism_level.crowds: Low shoulder season. Attractions become noticeably quieter.
tourism_level.pricing: Shoulder season prices more common.
tourism_level.overall_atmosphere: Distinctly autumnal. Can be beautiful with fall colors but expect wet and windy conditions. Hiking becomes less predictable.

events_holidays.name: Kapittel - Stavanger International Festival of Literature and Freedom of Speech
events_holidays.description: Major literature festival with readings, debates, concerts, featuring Norwegian and international authors.
events_holidays.notes: Check kapittel.no for program and dates. Events often in Norwegian, some in English.

unique_experiences.where: Petroleum Museum, Art Museum, Canning Museum, Maritime Museum
unique_experiences.description: Ideal time to explore indoor attractions as weather becomes less reliable. Learn about local history and culture.
unique_experiences.practical_tips: Check opening times. Consider multi-museum passes if available.

unique_experiences.where: Beaches south of Stavanger (e.g., Solastranden, Borestranden)
unique_experiences.description: Experience the dramatic coastline and beaches with autumn winds (dress warmly!). Popular for walks and surfing.
unique_experiences.practical_tips: Requires transport (car/bus). Wear windproof/waterproof clothing. Check tide times if relevant.
unique_experiences.best_time: Daytime, during a break in the rain

unique_experiences.description: Warm up indoors with coffee, cake, or a meal. Experience the local 'kos' (cozy) atmosphere.
unique_experiences.practical_tips: Seek out places with comfortable seating and warm ambiance.

unique_experiences.activity: See Swords in Rock (Sverd i fjell)
unique_experiences.description: Visit the iconic monument commemorating the unification of Norway. Can be dramatic with autumn skies.
unique_experiences.practical_tips: Accessible by bus. Can be combined with a walk along Hafrsfjord if weather permits.
